item.title: C Integer Overflow And Compare
item.description:
notice: this post used gcc, clang, pelle C, to test code. including C99, C17 standard I didnâ€™t change integer length in printf function except long long(64 bits) Conclusion Do not trust C when doing compare using integer with overflow case. It is very stupid. Expression C use complement to store numbers wikipedia use following code will easy to find out how numbers store in C. printf("%x
",1); // 1 printf("%x
",2); // 2 printf("%x
",-1); // ffffffff printf("%x
",-2); // fffffffe printf("%x
",0); // 0 printf("%x
",-0); // 0 printf("%d
",0x80000000); // the minium value -2147483648 printf("%d
",0xffffffff); // -1 printf("%d
",0x7fffffff); // largest value 2147483647 examination: why 0x8000 0000 is minimum value the first one means this number is negative value.
